inclusion.criterion: Patients about to start treatment with the inhaled combination of budesonide and formoterol fumarate dihydrate at doses 100 / 6mcg, 200 / 6mcg, 400/12 mcg, through Elpenhlaler device
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Regular treatment of asthma, wherein the administration of the combination (inhaled corticosteroid and long-action beta2-agonist) is appropriate
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients not adequately controlled with inhaled corticosteroids and 'as needed' inhaled beta2-agonists short-acting
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who signed Informed Consent Patients eligible to follow the study procedures
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who will be treated out of SpC
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients not eligible to follow the study procedures
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 15-year-old boy with asthma diagnosed a year ago. He presents with shortness of breath, chest tightening and cough.
